DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this trial is to test the safety and efficacy of two doses of aripiprazole in child and adolescent patients with bipolar I disorder, manic or mixed episode with or without psychotic features.
DOC.brief_title: Aripiprazole in Children and Adolescents With Bipolar I Disorder
DOC.criteria: Child and adolescent patients with bipolar I disorder, manic or mixed episode with or without psychotic features Patients with certain other psychological disorders Patients with a comorbid serious, uncontrolled systemic illness Patients with significant risk of committing suicide
DOC.keyword: Bipolar I Disorder, Manic or Mixed Episode with or without Psychotic Features
